## RenderingContextInterceptor interface

Interceptor that can expose transforms for the rendering contexts.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RenderingContextInterceptor 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [opRenderingContext](./api.renderingcontextinterceptor.oprenderingcontext.md) | <code>MonoTypeOperatorFunction&lt;RenderingContext&gt;</code> | operator to intercept a single rendering context |
|  [opRenderingContexts](./api.renderingcontextinterceptor.oprenderingcontexts.md) | <code>MonoTypeOperatorFunction&lt;RenderingContext[]&gt;</code> | operator to intercept a multiple rendering contexts |
